pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Double Bootstrap Method for Analyzing Linear Models with Autoregressive Errors // Computes the double bootstrap as discussed in McKnight, McKean, and Huitema (2000) doi:10.1037/1082-989X.5.1.87. The double bootstrap method provides a better fit for a linear model with autoregressive errors than ARIMA when the sample size is small.
